sentences.en: "Yous two are no 'gettin' paid," he said. "Ye're too lazy!"
sentences.cn: “你们两个别指望拿到工钱，”他说。“你们太懒了！”

sentences.en: Aren't you dressed yet, you lazy beggar?
sentences.cn: 你这个懒汉还没穿好衣服吗？

sentences.en: He felt too lazy to get out of bed.
He keeps company with all sorts of lazy characters.
sentences.cn: 他与形形色色的懒人为伍。

sentences.en: He roused himself from his lazy contemplation of the scene beneath him.
sentences.cn: 他不再懒洋洋地注视着下面的景色。

sentences.en: He was not stupid, just lazy.
He was not unintelligent, but he was lazy.
sentences.cn: 他并非不聪明，不过就是懒。

sentences.en: Her latest novel is perfect for a lazy summer's afternoon reading.
sentences.cn: 在慵懒的夏日午后阅读她的最新小说最合适不过了。

sentences.en: I admit to being congenitally lazy.
Keep them at it; don't let them get lazy.
sentences.cn: 要使他们不断努力下去, 不要让他们渐渐懒惰起来.

sentences.en: Lazy and incompetent police officers are letting the public down.
sentences.cn: 懒惰兼无能的警官令公众失望。

sentences.en: Of all the lazy, indifferent, unbusinesslike attitudes to have!
sentences.cn: 这是多么懒惰、冷漠、不敬业的态度！

sentences.en: She calls me lazy and selfish.
the laziest boy in the class
Their lazy, blurred voices fell pleasantly on his ears.
sentences.cn: 他们那种慢吞吞 、 含糊不清的声音在他听起来却很悦耳.

sentences.en: What can we do to urge these lazy workers to greater production?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能鼓励这些懒惰的工人去努力增产 呢 ?

sentences.en: When I say that the boys are lazy, I except you.
sentences.cn: 我说男孩懒惰, 并不包括你.

words.tran_cn: 懒洋洋地；怠惰地，懒散地

phrases.tran_cn: 锤出吊货法；吊柱间绳索；吊杆稳索
（餐桌上盛食物便于取食的）圆转盘

trans.tran_cn: 懒惰的，没精打采的，慢吞吞的
trans.tran_en: not liking work and physical activity, or not making any effort to do anything
